translations: v．调情，挑逗：以轻松、无意义的方式与他人互动，通常为了吸引对方注意或寻求浪漫关系。
· She flirted with him at the party.

sentences.sentence: She flirted with the idea of becoming an actress when she was younger.
sentences.translation: 她年纪更小一些时曾闹着玩似地想过当演员。

sentences.sentence: He has flirted with eccentric diversification plans.
sentences.translation: 他已迅速转向了怪异的多元化计划。
